WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is a bug and has been corrected in source code release 75843.
WorkItem.Description:
According to your explanation here on how to edit a task: 
http://taskscheduler.codeplex.com/workitem/9998
 
The TaskEditDialog should propagate changes back to the TaskService after editing.
I have used your supplied Form1.cs.
 
When editing a task that resides in a folder, the TaskEditDialog will create a duplicate Task and 
place it in the root folder, leaving the original untouched.
WorkItem.Summary: TaskEdit dialog doesn't adhere to folders
